title: Project 55: Stories from the bus
name: Project 55: Stories from the bus
description:
A Map by Asmaa

Concordia history students have created a guided audio tour of the bus route that snakes up the spine of St. Laurent Blvd. Here's a look at some its stops.

properties.name: 1. At Palais de justice
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaThe Project 55 audio tour, which recounts the history of the Main, begins here at the bus stop across from the Palais de justice. You can download the mp3 at their website.

properties.name: 2. At Notre Dame Basilica
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaNathalie, driver of STM bus 55, nears the end of her route as she passes the Notre Dame Basilica. She will now turn east to St. Laurent and return north along the Main. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 3. Going through Chinatown
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaAccording to Project 55, Montreal\'s ethnic neighbourhoods, like Chinatown, have been, and continue to be, in constant movement. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 4. The de Bullion detour
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaPeople go about their business while Bus 55 rides up its detour route past Prince Arthur. (Allen McInnnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 5. Approaching Laurier
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaThe bus holds back as a cyclist rides in the middle of the traffic lane on St. Laurent approaching Laurier. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 6. Under Van Horne overpass
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaThe bus rides along its route up St. Laurent under the Van Horne railway tracks. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 7. Through Little Italy
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaLittle Italy\'s sidewalk cafes are already starting to fill up. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 8. Past Jean-Talon
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaThe students behind Project 55 imagine the Main, here just north of Jean-Talon, as a type of cosmic glue that holds the city together. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)

properties.name: 9. End of the line at Chabanel
properties.description: Posted by AsmaaBus 55 sits at the end of the line, on Chabanel St., before beginning its return voyage south along St. Laurent Blvd. and then St. Urbain St. (Allen McInnis/The Gazette)
